author: Myah Ward
title: Michigan protesters turn out against Whitmer’s strict stay-at-home order
description: Many demonstrators, some waving Trump campaign flags, ignored organizers‘ pleas to stay in their cars and flooded the streets of Lansing, the state capital.
content: The Democratic governor last week issued one of the nations strictest stay-at-home orders amid the coronavirus pandemic, choosing to not align the state with a federal agencys revised list of critical infrastructure, which would allow some Michiganders to ret… [+2080 chars]
